docket_number: Petition No. 114 MAL 2008; Petition No. 115 MAL 2008

parties: Robert B. SKLAROFF, M.D., Petitioner v. Joel S. ARIO, Acting Insurance Commissioner for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent, Highmark, Inc., Intervenor. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of January, 2009, the Motion for Leave to File a Reply to Brief in Opposition and the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Jan. 7, 2009.
